wikipedia_page.main: David Eric Court (born 16 October 1958) is a British Anglican bishop. He has been the Bishop suffragan of Grimsby in the Church of England Diocese of Lincoln since 2014.

response: * David Court, Bishop of Grimsby (Diocese of Lincoln)
David Court was consecrated bishop on 25 July 2014 at St Paul's Cathedral.Diocese of Lincoln – New Bishop of Grimsby is announced  (Accessed 9 May 2014)
